utterances.utterance: Yes. Don't waste the agents' time.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.utterance: Can I ask you about, you pointed out earlier that, in the report, there's -- there's an instance where James Comey says he doesn't know that Huma Abedin and Anthony Weiner are married.

utterances.speaker: HARF
utterances.utterance: Right.

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.utterance: Yes, I mean, don't you watch "The Five"? We talked about that, like, every single day.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.utterance: And "Red Eye".

utterances.speaker: GUILFOYLE
utterances.utterance: We focused on that, yes.

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.utterance: She should have canned Huma. I don't know. Right? She should have canned Huma a long time ago. Would have saved some trouble.

utterances.speaker: GUILFOYLE
utterances.utterance: So much for canned.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.utterance: It's not Huma's fault. It's not Weiner's fault. It's Hillary's fault. But I think what's going to -- we're going to see this, and this is going to be one of the few I.G. reports. Right? And it's only going to crystallize when you look at this I.G. report and then the next one coming down the pipeline about how the Russia investigation --

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.utterance: I think the next one is actually about her email -- her decision not to charge her on the emails. I think that's the next one.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.utterance: OK, and that's going to be enlightening. Then we're going to see the decision that they made --

utterances.speaker: GUILFOYLE
utterances.utterance: The unredacted ones, though?

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.utterance: Right. And then we're going to see the decision that was made to open up this Russia collusion investigation; and we're going to see how differently the Hillary people were treated from the Trump people. Hillary was treated with extreme deference. Her people were given immunity. They destroyed evidence. There was no accountability there. And Trump and his team were treated like they were already guilty. And that's going to become clear. And we're going to see -- they've actually asked Strzok for his personal emails, and you know what he said? He refused to hand them over. So the disgusting and disparaging things he said on company email. Could you imagine what Strzok was texting to people on his personal email? It's going to be the worst.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.utterance: Maybe because he was at home, maybe he wasn't.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.utterance: Well, you know, we'll see. That's why a lot of people think we need a special counsel to subpoena those, because --

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.utterance: The text messages were to his --

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.utterance: -- the I.G. has no subpoena power here.

utterances.speaker: GUILFOYLE
utterances.utterance: Yes.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.utterance: Right, Kimberly.

utterances.speaker: GUILFOYLE
utterances.utterance: Look, I've got no time for this guy. I think it's just terrible, and everybody, probably, in the FBI cannot stand him. But again, I would go higher than that. I would say it's Comey. I would go higher than that. I'd say it's Hillary Clinton, all of the above. None of these people should be proud of their actions. As a former officer of the couch, as a prosecutor, and I see what happens here and subverting justice and perpetuating a fraud on the American people. There really is just no justification for this.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.utterance: Perhaps the only consequence, though, or punishment. It's like a slap on the wrist.

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.utterance: Well, I have a little bit of breaking news. We're talking about the foreign actor penetrating the Clinton emails. Turns out that it was Antonio Banderas.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.utterance: Really?

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.utterance: Yes. Either that or Javier Bardem. They're the only foreign actors I know.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.utterance: They -- they did find that, when Hillary was in a hostile country, she emailed with Barack Obama, and they knew that. James Comey did. But when he released his report, he scrubbed Obama's name and just said "an unnamed government" --

utterances.speaker: HARF
utterances.utterance: Did Donald Trump ever use a personal phone or email?

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.utterance: He probably does. That's what's so ridiculous about this.

utterances.speaker: HARF
utterances.utterance: No, I just thought it was an interesting question to ask. What do you think?

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.utterance: You know what? We don't know.

utterances.speaker: HARF
utterances.utterance: There have been reports that he does. And so let's -- if we're so concerned about email security and what devices we use, maybe we should be consistent and make sure --

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.utterance: OK, if we're going to be consistent, maybe he should smash his BlackBerry with a hammer before he turns it over.

utterances.speaker: HARF
utterances.utterance: I would love it if it meant he didn't tweet again. I would love to.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.utterance: What would we talk about, Marie? Come on. You've got a whole radio show. You've got two hours.

utterances.speaker: HARF
utterances.utterance: I know.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.utterance: What would you do without the tweets.

utterances.speaker: GUILFOYLE
utterances.utterance: Dan Scavino can tweet from his phone.

utterances.speaker: HARF
utterances.utterance: No kidding.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.utterance: Well, we're, like, basically trying to --

utterances.speaker: GUILFOYLE
utterances.utterance: Fill time.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.utterance: Water from a stone.

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.utterance: I think there was a little something for everybody.

utterances.speaker: HARF
utterances.utterance: That is true.

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.utterance: You know what it was? It was like a Vegas buffet. It's never as good as the actual pictures of the food.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.utterance: I don't really like picture food.

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.utterance: You see the pictures. And it's not --

utterances.speaker: GUILFOYLE
utterances.utterance: Really? You love to eat those.

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.utterance: You've got the eggs benedict. You've got the pancakes. You've got the waffles. I'm really stretching this.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.utterance: Yes.

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.utterance: And then, when you get to the buffet, it's never as good.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.utterance: But do you like to go to restaurants where they have pictures of the food? I don't like to go to those.

utterances.speaker: GUILFOYLE
utterances.utterance: That's usually a flag. That's usually a warning sign. I mean, except if it's McDonald's.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.utterance: Right, right, right. Fast food is different. Jesse, final thoughts?

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.utterance: Final thoughts.

utterances.speaker: HARF
utterances.utterance: Are you going to read this whole thing this weekend?

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.utterance: I mean, this is a lot of heavy lifting here.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.utterance: That's what we do.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.utterance: It's going to get worse. I feel like they're going to find even more dirty nuggets in this thing.

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.utterance: Dirty nuggets.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.utterance: And by the time that's over --

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.utterance: Don't you think they're already found?

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.utterance: -- it's going to be onto the weekend. Look, we've gotten all this after three hours. Three hours. They're going to have a whole night of people reading this stuff, a bunch of staffers. There's going to be much more incriminating stuff. But we'll be on to some other story tomorrow.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.utterance: Onto another story. That is true. Well, set your DVRs. Never miss an episode of "The Five." "Special Report" is up next. More breaking news on the DOJ I.G. report with Bret Baier.
